attributes.action: Stop the children with negative behaviour getting special treatment
attributes.additional_details: As a pupil myself I feel I work hard each term for nothing but I look around and see a large growth to negative students and behavioural units. students not only get to leave school early but are starting a hairdressing courses, biking and receiving fast food while others are working there socks off for what feels like nothing I feel this is what is causing a lot more antisocial behaviour within and outside schools and if there was a stop to this then we would see a-lot less negative behaviour
attributes.background: I want the government to put a stop to schools giving negative behaviour a reward e.g. fast food, quad biking, early college courses

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for. 
 
Decisions about this are a matter for schools, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

If you are concerned about your school's policies you could raise this with your parent, guardian or school.
